doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 19
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 19
COMMERCIAL: Dan Gendron, Horologist, "Stop paying too much for antique watches"

1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community. Includes footage from NY1 of [NYS Attorney General Dennis Vacco] responding to call-in question from Andy Humm.

2. Footage of event awaiting decision in Colorado Amendment 2 case [Romer v. Evans]. Includes interviews with Suzanne Goldberg, Attorney for Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund (Lambda); Beatrice Dohrn and Tom Stoddard, of Lambda; and Evan Wolfson, [Staff Attorney] for Lambda.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Earth Share, "It's a connected world."
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, National Alliance for Research on Schizophrenia and Depression

3. Footage of 1996 Lambda Liberty Awards. Includes footage of Kevin Cathcart, Executive Director of the Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund; William Hibsher, [of the Board of Directors for the Hetrick-Martin Institute]; Jed Mattes, award recipient/former President of the Board of the Hetrick-Martin Institute; Urvashi Vaid, award recipient/former Director of the National Gay and Lesbian Task Force; and Gerry Studds, award recipient/retiring openly gay Congressman from Massachusetts.
4. Footage of PrideFest Philadelphia 1996. Includes footage of Malcolm Lazin, founder of PrideFest Philadelphia, and Donna Mae Stemmer.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
6. Entertainment News. Includes footage from Oprah interviewing Dennis Rodman.
COMMERCIAL: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), "America Responds to AIDS"

7. Footage of 4th Annual HX (Homo Xtra) Awards. Includes Linda Simpson, event hostess; Matt Foreman, [Executive Director] of the Anti-Violence Project/Special Honor Roll Award recipient; Kiki Herold, award presenter; Lady Bunny, Special Honor Roll Award recipient; and Varla Jean Merman, award presenter.
COMMERCIAL: Dan Gendron, Horologist, "Stop paying too much for antique watches"
8. Max Harrold interviews Michael Huhn, creator of "Peepshow" book, at the Leslie-Lohman Gallery.
9. Footage of Black and Blue Ball 1996.
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 19: 1996
